entries: You are currently enrolled at a school of magic, where you're learning the fundamentals of your magical tradition. Whether your adventuring occurs during breaks between semesters, as part of a work study program, or even within the halls of the academy itself, you'll have to learn to juggle your dual life.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in your choice of {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Occultism}, or {@skill Religion}, as well as {@skill Lore||Academia Lore}. You gain the {@feat Recognize Spell} skill feat.
